name: Tourney Trasher
description:
https://kthaux.github.io/ArcheryMissing/

A small money management game in which you own an archery range. Bet on the underdogs and then sabotage the competition to ensure you get a large payout.

School project for UCSC's CMPM-120 and ARTG-120

Credits:

Keaton Haux - Programming

Sean Osborne - Programming

Jennifer To - Art
